verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>fully<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> it, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> thereof, both the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> them, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them;

That the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> were the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> and were <S%H5975>over<s%> them that were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H7126>offered:<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6632>covered<s%> <S%H5699>wagons,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1241>oxen;<s%> a <S%H5699>wagon<s%> for <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> and for each one an <S%H7794>ox:<s%> and they <S%H7126>brought<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> it of them, that they may be to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5656>service.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

<S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service:<s%>

And <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service,<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

But to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>none:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> belonging to them was that they should <S%H5375>bear<s%> on their <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> for <S%H2598>dedicating<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was <S%H4886>anointed,<s%> even the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> their <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> They shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> on his <S%H3117>day,<s%> for the <S%H2598>dedicating<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he that <S%H7126>offered<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%>

And his <S%H7133>offering<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>charger,<s%> the weight thereof was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> shekels, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the sanctuary; <S%H8147>both<s%> of them were <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with oil for a meat <S%H4503>offering:<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H3709>spoon<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H7004>incense:<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering:

And for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> rams, <S%H2568>five<s%> he <S%H6260>goats,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> lambs of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> was the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
